name: Clash Island
description:
Lost on a island with three friends, your last hope is to write a message on the sand and be noticed by a plane. A plane is passing above you and your friends, unfortunately it seems that there's not enough space on it. Indeed, only two places are available ! Team up, catch the attention of the plane and be the lucky survivors to escape. Make the most beautiful message on the sand with props and don't forget to sabotage the ennemy team. Will you be able to write a decent SOS ?

Game realised during the Global Game Jam 2021 @ CG Academy

Autors : 
    GÜNAY Sena : Character artist - Animation - 2D art
    DUBOIS Timothy  : Environment artist - Props art - Video maker
    DE CNUYDT Benjamin : Gameplay programmer
    POLET William : UI programmer - Sound designer  

Music by Mica Emory
